AmuletOfPain.NAME: Amulet of Pain
AmuletOfPain.FLAVOR: A cursed trinket designed to draw the evil eye.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 times you take damage in combat, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

DoggyBag.NAME: Doggy Bag
DoggyBag.FLAVOR: The carefully packed remains of a tasty meal.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you defeat an elite, raise your Max HP by #b10.

EternalHunger.NAME: Eternal Hunger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b1 HP and draw #b1 extra card.

Gemstone.NAME: Gemstone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you have #b300 or more gold, gain #b2 Strength and #b2 Dexterity.

InfiniteFamine.NAME: Infinite Famine
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Eternal Hunger. At the start of your turn, lose #b2 HP and draw #b2 extra cards.

Lollipop.NAME: Lollipop
Lollipop.FLAVOR: A satisfying solution to an oral fixation.
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the HP loss of Eternal Hunger, Infinite Famine, and Hunger Pangs by #b1.
